mSaveSessionName.description: The name of the session we are playing

mAllowPossessAny.description: Command line param -PossesAny will allow players using authorization to posses other players on startup regardless of if their UniqueIds match

mDebugStartingPointTagName.description: Overriding selected starting point when respawning.

mDefaultRemoteCallObjectsClassNames.description: Config property to reference remote call objects for player controllers

mServerRestartTimeHours.description: After how many hours should the server restart itself

mSkipTutorialInPIE.description: Skips the tutorial step if we play in PIE
